name: Tava na beira da praia, vendo o que a mare fazia
lyrics: Tava na beira da praia vendo que maré fazia Tava na beira da praia vendo que maré fazia Tava na beira da praia vendo que maré fazia Tava na beira da praia vendo que maré fazia Quando eu ia ela voltava Quando eu voltava ela ia Quando eu ia ela voltava Quando eu voltava ela ia Mas eu ia ela voltava Quando eu voltava ela ia

translations.text: I was on the edge of the beach, seeing what the tide would do I was on the edge of the beach, seeing what the tide would do I was on the edge of the beach, seeing what the tide would do I was on the edge of the beach, seeing what the tide would do When I went, she returned When I returned, she went When I went, she returned When I returned, she went But I went, she returned When I returned, she went

A tengerparton álltam, nézve, mit csinál a dagály A tengerparton álltam, nézve, mit csinál a dagály A tengerparton álltam, nézve, mit csinál a dagály A tengerparton álltam, nézve, mit csinál a dagály Amikor mentem, ő visszajött Amikor visszajövök, ő elmegy Amikor mentem, ő visszajött Amikor visszajövök, ő elmegy De amikor mentem, ő visszajött Amikor visszajövök, ő elmegy
